text: Don Gordon (November 13, 1926 - April 24, 2017) was an American movie and television actor. He is sometimes known as Donald Gordon. Gordon was known for his roles in Bullitt, Papillon, Omen III: The Final Conflict, Revolt at Fort Laramie, The Exorcist III, and in Lethal Weapon. ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Don Gordon
